name: Sleeping With Death
description:
The zombie plague has taken over cities and military bases, you are the only one who can stop this madness. Kill as many zombies as you can.

Kill them using PISTOL
Destroy them using SHOTGUN
Burn them with FLAMETHROWER
Cut them with a KNIFE

Collect money to buy upgrades.
Grow STRONG and finish off the ultimate zombie boss to free humanity from the plague
